definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: This article aims to analyze various processing methods for groundwater excavation of the foundation ditch in earthwork construction.
sentences.chinese: 分析土方工程施工中基坑開挖地下水的各種處理辦法。

sentences.english: Collapse distribution centres on the intensive runoff zones.
sentences.chinese: 在地下水強徑流帶，塌陷分佈較爲密集。

sentences.english: As a kind of water resource, Groundwater is of great importance in Dezhou.
sentences.chinese: 地下水是德州市重要的水資源。

sentences.english: Studying on groundwater in Hebei Plain has been an academic focus all the time.
sentences.chinese: 河北平原地下水的研究一直以來都是學者關注的焦點。

sentences.english: compounding that, underpricing means it is often used for watering low-value crops.
sentences.chinese: 地下水的抑價說明其經常被用來灌溉低價值作物。

sentences.english: Ground waters originating in different beds commingle.
sentences.chinese: 來源於不同層位的地下水相互混合。

sentences.english: "Groundwater resources are being rapidly depleted in many regions of the world," says U.C. Irvine hydrologist James Famiglietti, another team member.
sentences.chinese: 世界許多地區都存在過度消耗地下水的狀況。

sentences.english: The research of sulphur balance in agro-ecosystem was reviewed with special regard to the input to groundwater.
sentences.chinese: 論述考慮地下水中硫投入的農田生態系統中硫的平衡。

sentences.english: It was therefore the reason that caused the iron and manganese pollution in groundwater of landfill site.
sentences.chinese: 從而造成垃圾場地下水較嚴重的鐵錳污染。

sentences.english: Nitrate nitrogen removal from ground water by autotrophic denitrification in a packed bed reactor.
sentences.chinese: 固定牀自養反硝化去除地下水中的硝酸鹽氮。

sentences.english: Research of Eco-water Table and Rational Depth of Groundwater of Tarim River Drainage Basin;
sentences.chinese: 最後提出了恢復海河流域地下水生態水位的措施。

sentences.english: It couples the groundwater flow equation with the solute-transport equation.
sentences.chinese: 它把地下水流動方程與溶質輸運方程耦合在一起。

sentences.english: Water tables in parts of India and China have dropped catastrophically in the last few years.
sentences.chinese: 過去幾年裏中國和印度部分地區的地下水位嚴重下降。

sentences.english: It has been seeping into groundwater from ­industry for years.
sentences.chinese: 多年來它已經從工業污染物裏滲入到地下水。

sentences.english: Groundwater system is an intricate and stochastic system.
sentences.chinese: 地下水系統是一個複雜的隨機系統。

sentences.english: The infiltration gallery is widely used in the northeast and west-east areas of China to collect under-ground water.
sentences.chinese: 滲渠式集水廊道是一種集取地下水的構築物形式。

definition: water source/water supply/headwaters of a river
variant of 岩層|岩层[yan2 ceng2]/rock strata
mouth of a spring or fountain
